text: Gilruth is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Jenny Gilruth, Scottish politician *John A. Gilruth (1871–1937), Australian veterinary scientist and former Administrator of the Northern Territory *May H. Gilruth, (1885–1962), American artist *Robert R. Gilruth (1913–2000), American aviation and space pioneer *George Ritchie Gilruth MD FRSE (d.1921), Scottish surgeon ==See also== * Mount Gilruth, mountain of Antarctica
title: Gilruth
